trans-unit.source: Provides an attached property store for <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref>.

<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasic> allows for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings> to be attached to the top level activity in a workflow defined in a XAML file, thus defining the settings for all <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> expressions in that workflow.
Retrieves the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance attached to the specified object.
The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance attached to the specified object.
Attaches a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to the specified object.
The object to which the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance is attached.
Attaches a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance to an object for use by its implementation.
<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasic.SetSettingsForImplementation%2A> exists for the activity author who is creating a new activity in a class.

Any <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings> required by the new activityâ€™s implementation should be attached to the activity in the constructor using <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasic.SetSettingsForImplementation%2A>.
The object to which the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance is attached.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance associated with the specified object should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
